item.title: 哈佛大学洽谈出售 10 亿美元私募股权
item.description: 哈佛大学的捐赠基金正在就出售大约 10 亿美元的私募股权基金股权进行深入谈判，而此时学校正面临着唐纳德-特朗普的威胁和非流动资产回报市场疲软所带来的财务不确定性和压力。【原文：Harvard University’s endowment is in advanced talks to sell roughly $1 billion of private equity fund stakes, at a time when the school faces financial uncertainty and pressure from Donald Trump’s threats and a sluggish market for returns on illiquid assets.】

item.title: 南非国务卿戈东瓦纳表示不会因增值税调头而辞职
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）表示，他认为没有理由辞职，因为他在增税提议上的转折可能导致南非联合政府破裂。【原文：South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana said he sees no reason to resign following his U-turn on a proposed tax increase that threatened to rupture the nation’s coalition government.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会解决了针对将特朗普媒体上市的 SPAC 首席执行官的诉讼
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会正在解决针对空头支票公司前首席执行官的民事欺诈诉讼，该公司曾帮助唐纳德-特朗普的社交媒体公司上市。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission is resolving a civil fraud suit against the former chief executive of the blank-check firm that helped bring Donald Trump’s social media company public.】

item.title: 巴拿马总统在矿山谈判前煽动民族主义情绪
item.description: 巴拿马总统若泽-劳尔-穆利诺（Jose Raul Mulino）在其政府准备与运营商第一量子矿业有限公司（First Quantum Minerals Ltd.）谈判重启铜矿的可能性之际，对该国一座已关闭的铜矿发表了民族主义言论。【原文：Panama’s President Jose Raul Mulino stepped up nationalist rhetoric toward a shuttered copper mine in the country as his administration prepares to negotiate a potential restart with operator First Quantum Minerals Ltd.】

item.title: 欧洲央行认为尽管关税混乱，但通胀工作已基本完成
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）官员开始公开讨论该地区经济可能需要哪些货币政策补救措施来应对近期全球贸易的震荡。【原文：European Central Bank officials are starting to open up on what monetary-policy remedies the region’s economy may need to cope with the recent jolts to global trade.】

item.title: 马来西亚下调经济增长预期，与美国讨论 "公平 "贸易问题
item.description: 据一位高级官员透露，由于关税对经济造成压力，马来西亚正在下调其经济增长前景，同时寻求在本周与美国官员启动的贸易谈判中达成 "公平 "协议。【原文：Malaysia is revising down its growth outlook as tariffs weigh on the economy, while seeking a “fair” deal in trade talks that kick off with US officials this week, according to a top official.】

item.title: 纳斯达克与亚马逊网络公司合作，将更多市场迁移至云端
item.description: 纳斯达克公司正在与亚马逊网络服务公司合作，帮助交易所和业内其他公司将其服务转移到云端，而无需花费数年的开发时间和费用来实现自身的现代化。【原文：Nasdaq Inc. is working with Amazon Web Services to help exchanges and others in the industry shift their services to the cloud without the added years of development and expense it would take to modernize on their own.】

item.title: 库基斯称零关税将是最有效的欧盟-美国协议
item.description: 德国财政部长约尔格-库基斯（Joerg Kukies）表示，欧盟和美国达成一项工业产品零关税的贸易协议，将是解决目前紧张局势的最佳途径。【原文：A trade deal that would see the European Union and the US zero out tariffs on industrial products would be the best way to resolve the current tensions, according to German Finance Minister Joerg Kukies.】

item.title: 野村考虑在 Archegos 4 年后更深入地进军主经纪业务
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. is weighing a return to offering cash prime-brokerage services in the US and Europe, businesses it largely exited just four years ago following the implosion of Archegos Capital Management.】

item.title: 丘吉尔唐斯因关税忧虑推迟德比项目而暴跌
item.description: 周四，丘吉尔唐斯公司（Churchill Downs Inc.【原文：Shares of Churchill Downs Inc. were pummeled Thursday after the gambling company said it would delay some longer-term projects at its namesake racetrack due to uncertainty around tariffs and their potential impact on construction costs.】

item.title: 纽森称加州现已成为世界第四大经济体
item.description: 加州州长加文-纽森（Gavin Newsom）夸耀说，加州已成为世界第四大经济体，在全球排名中仅次于美国、中国和德国。【原文：California Governor Gavin Newsom boasted that his state has become the world’s fourth-largest economy, following only the US, China and Germany in global rankings.】

item.title: 加拿大卡车公司 TFI 受关税战影响，退出交易
item.description: 北美最大的卡车运输公司之一 TFI 国际公司表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战加剧了货运业的艰难前景，公司因此被迫放弃一项交易。【原文：TFI International Inc., one of North America’s largest trucking companies, says US President Donald Trump’s trade war is exacerbating the freight industry’s difficult outlook, and that it was forced to abandon a deal because of it.】

item.title: 纽约市民为安德鲁-科莫的法律诉讼支付了 6000 多万美元
item.description: 在安德鲁-科莫（Andrew Cuomo）竞选纽约市下一任市长的幕后，这位前州长正在为洗刷自己的清白打一场昂贵的官司。纽约市民几乎承担了所有的费用。【原文：Behind the scenes of Andrew Cuomo’s campaign to become New York City’s next mayor, the former governor is fighting an expensive legal battle to clear his name. New Yorkers are on the hook to pay for almost all of it.】

item.title: Fortress 以 1 亿美元可转换债券交易支持 Dataminr
item.description: Dataminr 已从 Fortress 投资集团获得 1 亿美元融资，这是这家估值 41 亿美元的人工智能平台在一个多月内获得的第二次融资。【原文：Dataminr has secured $100 million in financing from Fortress Investment Group, the second fundraise in a little over a month for the artificial-intelligence platform that was valued at $4.1 billion.】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利称对美元下跌的担忧过虑了
item.description: 英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，在美元和国债因唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税和动荡的决策而遭到抛售之后，人们对美元将失去其储备货币地位的担忧是 "过度的"。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey said fears that the US dollar will lose its reserve currency status are “overdone” after a selloff of the greenback and Treasuries in response to Donald Trump’s tariffs and volatile policymaking.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Antara 创始人冻结资金后跳槽
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Antara Capital 创始人 Himanshu Gulati 即将离开这家陷入困境的对冲基金，加入 Marshall Wace。【原文：Antara Capital founder Himanshu Gulati is leaving the struggling hedge fund to join Marshall Wace, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 摩托罗拉推出售价 1,300 美元的人工智能 Razr 手机和施华洛世奇耳塞
item.description: 摩托罗拉推出了新款 Razr 可折叠手机阵容，该阵容配备了一套人工智能助手，是对其产品组合的一次意义深远的全面改革，其中还包括新款耳塞和手表。【原文：Motorola launched a new Razr foldable phone lineup loaded with a suite of artificial intelligence assistants in a far-reaching overhaul of its portfolio that also includes new earbuds and a watch.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率微跌，30 年期平均利率降至 6.81
item.description: 美国的抵押贷款利率在过去四周内第三次下降。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US fell for the third time in the past four weeks.】

item.title: 铀生产国纳米比亚希望开发核电站
item.description: 纳米比亚总统内通博-南迪-恩戴特瓦（Netumbo Nandi-Ndaitwah）表示，纳米比亚将启动有关可能开发核电站的谈判，以寻求能源结构的多样化。【原文：Namibia will initiate talks on the possible development of a nuclear plant as it seeks to diversify its energy mix, President Netumbo Nandi-Ndaitwah said.】

item.title: 任天堂 Switch 2 预购订单在美国商店迅速售罄
item.description: 美国零售商早在周四午夜就开始接受任天堂公司新款Switch 2游戏机的预订，并很快在许多地方售罄。【原文：US retailers began taking preorders for Nintendo Co.’s new Switch 2 console as early as midnight on Thursday and quickly sold out at many locations.】

item.title: 关税和法郎的双重打击让瑞士总统前往华盛顿
item.description: 瑞士总统本周将在华盛顿游说特朗普政府官员，因为人们越来越担心关税和货币飙升对竞争力的双重打击。【原文：Switzerland’s president is lobbying Trump administration officials in Washington this week, as concern mounts over the double hit to competitiveness from tariffs and a soaring currency.】

item.title: 阿波罗与 "新市场 "集团携手拉拢普通投资者
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. debuted a division to oversee four businesses aimed at capturing the trillions of dollars up for grabs from individuals and striking more partnerships with traditional asset managers.】

item.title: 纽蒙特利润超预期，领涨黄金矿工股
item.description: 纽蒙特公司（Newmont Corp. ）公布的季度收益超出华尔街预期，该公司股价周四上涨，在主要黄金生产商中涨幅居前。【原文：Newmont Corp.’s stock rose Thursday to lead gains of major gold producers after the US mining company posted quarterly earnings that beat Wall Street’s expectations.】

item.title: 欧洲私人放贷人希望参与 "卖美国 "运动
item.description: 长期以来，在美国主导的私人信贷世界里，它们一直是次要的，但欧洲的基金经理们现在正受到全球 LPs 的青睐，他们渴望在 "卖美 "运动中分一杯羹。【原文：They’ve long been a second thought in the US-dominated world of private credit, but fund managers in Europe are now getting a spike in interest from global LPs — and they’re eager to grab a piece of the “Sell America” movement.】

item.title: 通胀之痛后，欧洲央行起草更灵活的政策措施计划
item.description: 随着全球环境日益动荡，欧洲中央银行将考虑改变其货币政策战略，以便对价格冲击做出更加灵活的反应。【原文：The European Central Bank is set to consider changing its monetary-policy strategy to enable more nimble responses to price shocks as the global environment becomes increasingly volatile.】

item.title: 四月动荡之后，安杜兰对冲基金亏损加剧至 52
item.description: 对冲基金经理皮埃尔-安杜兰（Pierre Andurand）在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税大棒引发的动荡中连连亏损，一直持续到四月份。【原文：Hedge fund manager Pierre Andurand’s losing streak continued well into April amid the turmoil sparked by US President Donald Trump’s tariff barrage.】

item.title: 科威特考虑在埃及追加 40 亿美元投资的计划
item.description: 科威特正在深入讨论将埃及中央银行持有的 40 亿美元存款转为在该国的投资，这是在中东人口最多的国家从数十年来最严重的经济危机中反弹之际对该国的又一推动。【原文：Kuwait is in advanced discussions to convert $4 billion of deposits held in Egypt’s central bank into investments in the country, another boost for the Middle East’s most populous nation as it rebounds from the worst economic crisis in decades.】

item.title: 隆巴代利表示，英国央行必须假定经济冲击将持续存在
item.description: 英国央行副行长克莱尔-隆巴代利（Clare Lombardelli）表示，英国央行必须假定未来世界经济将持续受到冲击，这意味着政策制定者将不得不在利率决策中更多地使用情景假设。【原文：The Bank of England must assume that the future for world economy is one of persistent shocks that mean policymakers will have to make greater use of scenarios for interest-rate decisions, Deputy Governor Clare Lombardelli said.】

item.title: 反垄断机构点头后，Codelco-SQM 锂交易有望在今年完成
item.description: 一年前，SQM 公司与 Codelco 公司达成了一项具有里程碑意义的锂矿交易，在获得关键的反垄断批准后，该交易有望在智利大选前敲定。【原文：A landmark lithium deal struck a year ago between SQM and Codelco is on course to be finalized before Chile’s general elections after securing a key antitrust approval.】
